why.description: State NovaOS purpose, philosophy, and identity

shutdown.description: Shutdown NovaOS and return to Persona mode

human_state.description: Open the HUMAN STATE section menu

identity.description: Open the IDENTITY (Player Profile) section menu

workflow.description: Open the QUEST ENGINE section menu

timerhythm.description: Open the TIME RHYTHM section menu

commands.description: Open the CUSTOM COMMANDS section menu

store.description: Store a memory item (semantic/procedural/episodic) with tags.

recall.description: Recall memory items filtered by type and/or tags.

forget.description: Forget memory items by id, tag, or type.

quest.description: Open the Quest Board to list, start, or resume a quest.

next.description: Submit your last answer and advance to the next step in the active quest.

pause.description: Pause the active quest and save your progress.

quest-log.description: View your current quest, recent completions, XP, skills, and learning streak.

quest-reset.description: Reset a quest's progress so you can replay it from the start.

quest-compose.description: Compose a new questline with LLM assistance.

quest-delete.description: Delete a questline and its saved progress.

quest-list.description: List all quest definitions with IDs, categories, and difficulty.

quest-inspect.description: Inspect a quest definition and all its steps.

quest-debug.description: Show raw quest engine state for debugging.
